For Sale, T210 Mascot. I looked for this card for about 7 years and then was able to acquire it a little while back. Unfortunately, need to sell to fund something else. This card will grade numerically.

Buy with confidence, I have been a Net54 member since 04'.

$sold, please email me at 

[url]jeffissurfing@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks!

Jeff Williams

Price is sold for this rare card, first come first served.
